EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in the CITGO Fleet Select Card Program.
Below you will find some additional information about our CITGO Fleet Select Card Program to help you consider our widely accepted CITGO Fleet Select Card as the one-card solution for all your fueling needs.
We save you money. Robust fuel rebates at all CITGO locations. We save you time. You’ll enjoy the convenience of a single fueling card program and one, easy-to-read invoice. You can also easily download transaction data from the web right to QuickBooks or Excel each month. We give you control. Detailed reports show how and where you spent your fueling money, so you can account for every penny. We make it convenient. Your drivers only need to carry one card to fuel and save at any participating location.
You can find a complete list of accepting locations at http://www.citgo.com/Locator/StoreLocator.jsp
It’s easy to enroll. Simply complete the attached application form and fax it back to me at {!User.Fax}. You can also scan and email the form back to me at the email address below.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} Email - {!User.Email}
